definition: old variant of 碰[peng4]
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge

sentences.english: The four pads should directly contact the glass substrate being tested.
sentences.chinese: 在測試時四個墊片應該直接踫觸到玻璃基板。

sentences.english: Also, when foreigners read the "shopping basket project" in the newspaper, they feel confused.
sentences.chinese: 還有，比如說讀報課，閱讀課上踫到“菜籃子工程”。

sentences.english: They thought he should have known better than to let her do those things to him.
sentences.chinese: 他們認爲耶穌該知道她是誰，更不該讓她踫觸祂。
